title: FreeStackAllocatedMemory (Function)
text:
FUNCTION FreeStackAllocatedMemory
Frees data, which got initialized by stack internal functionalities. The latter initializations may happen
when, i.e. a string, which could get changed from any BACnet client, shall be read out and used within IEC,
although its size can be only known by the BACnet stack, which then allocates memory for this string, which has
to be freed after usage using this function.

rows.Name: pData
rows.Comment:
Pointer to the data/memory allocated by the BACnet stack to
be freed again.
